title: EZLN - El Fuego y la Palabra
description:
Collection of four CDs with songs that musicians worldwide donated to support the cause of the Zapatist Army of National Liberation (EjÃƒÂ©rcito Zapatista de LiberaciÃƒÂ³n Nacional) in Chiapas, Mexico. All the funds from selling these CDs went to the Juntas de Buen Gobierno zapatist in the communities of the liberated zone. Some of the included musicians are Joaquin Sabina, Manu Chao, Banda Basotti, Kortatu, Leon Gieco, Fermin Muguruza, Mano Negra, Ismael Serrano, Pedro Guerra, Vicente FeliÃƒÂº as well as a fabule from Subcomandante Marcos and many tracks from local bands and musicians.
